scripts.build: powershell -Command "mkdir dist/api; mkdir dist/pages; mkdir dist/public/assets; Copy-Item src/api/index.js dist/api/index.js; Copy-Item src/pages/index.html dist/pages/index.html; Copy-Item src/pages/success.html dist/pages/success.html; Copy-Item -Recurse public/assets/* dist/public/assets"
